mapper.insert:
insert into TB_PRODUCT( F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTPIC, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_PRICE, F_CLSID, F_ISSPECIAL ) values ( #{F_PRODUCTNAME}, #{F_PRODUCTPIC}, #{F_PRODUCTDESC}, #{F_PRICE}, #{F_CLSID}, #{F_ISSPECIAL} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.update: update TB_PRODUCT set F_PRODUCTNAME = #{F_ProductName}, F_PRODUCTDESC = #{F_PRODUCTDESC}, F_PRICE = #{F_PRICE}, F_CLSID = #{F_CLSID}, F_ISSPECIAL = #{F_IsSpecial} where F_PRODUCT_ID = #{F_PRODUCT_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT7y F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_PRICE, F_CLSID, F_ISSPECIAL, F_PRODUCT_ID, F_Number, F_Express, (select F_ClsName From tb_class tc where tc.F_ClsId = tbproduct.F_CLSID)as F_CLSNAME, (select PATH From tb_pictures tbpictures where tbpictures.TABLE_UID_VALUE = tbproduct.F_PRODUCT_ID limit 0,1) AS PATH FROM TB_PRODUCT tbproduct WHERE F_PRODUCT_ID = #{F_PRODUCT_ID}

select F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_PRICE, F_CLSID, F_ISSPECIAL, F_PRODUCT_ID, tbpictures.PATH as PATH from TB_PRODUCT tbproduct,TB_PICTURES tbpictures where tbproduct.F_ProductPic = tbpictures.PICTURES_ID AND F_CLSID = #{pd.F_ClsId}

select F_PARENT_SKU, F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_PRICE, F_CLSID, F_ISSPECIAL, F_PRODUCT_ID, F_PATH, F_PATH1, F_PATH2, F_PATH3, F_PATH4, F_PATH5, F_PATH6, F_PATH7, F_PATH8 from tb_product tp where F_Status = 1 AND F_MAIN = 1 order by F_ProductTime desc limit 0,10

select F_PARENT_SKU, F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_PRICE, F_REAL_PRICE, F_CLSID, F_ISSPECIAL, F_PRODUCT_ID, F_PATH, F_PATH1, F_PATH2, F_PATH3, F_PATH4, F_PATH5, F_PATH6, F_PATH7, F_PATH8 from tb_product tp where F_Status = 1 AND F_MAIN = 1 order by F_Degree desc limit 0,6

select F_PARENT_SKU, F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_PRICE, F_REAL_PRICE, F_CLSID, F_ISSPECIAL, F_PRODUCT_ID, F_PATH, F_PATH1, F_PATH2, F_PATH3, F_PATH4, F_PATH5, F_PATH6, F_PATH7, F_PATH8 from tb_product tp where F_Status = 1 and F_IsSpecial=0 AND F_MAIN = 1 order by F_Degree desc limit 0,10

select F_PRODUCT_ID, F_PARENT_SKU, F_SKU, F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_SHOW_PRICE, F_PRICE, F_REAL_PRICE, F_Number, F_Express, F_CLSID, F_ProductTime, F_Status, F_ISSPECIAL, F_Degree, F_PATH, F_PATH1, F_PATH2, F_PATH3, F_PATH4, F_PATH5, F_PATH6, F_PATH7, F_PATH8, F_BRAND, F_COLOR, F_SIZE, F_LABEL, F_SALE_NUM from tb_product tp where F_Status = 1 AND F_PARENT_SKU = #{F_PARENT_SKU} order by F_ProductTime desc
select DISTINCT(F_COLOR) from tb_product tp where F_Status = 1 AND F_PARENT_SKU = #{F_PARENT_SKU} order by F_ProductTime desc
select DISTINCT(F_SIZE) from tb_product tp where F_Status = 1 AND F_PARENT_SKU = #{F_PARENT_SKU} order by F_ProductTime desc
select * from tb_product tp where F_Status = 1 AND F_MAIN=1 AND F_ClsId = #{FClsId} order by F_ProductTime desc limit 0,5

select a.F_PRODUCTNAME, a.F_PRODUCTDESC, a.F_PRICE, F_REAL_PRICE, a.F_CLSID, a.F_ISSPECIAL, a.F_PRODUCT_ID, F_PATH1, F_PATH2, F_PATH3, F_PATH4, F_PATH5, F_PATH6, F_PATH7, F_PATH8 from TB_PRODUCT a where 1=1
and ( a.F_ProductName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYWORD}),'%') or a.F_ProductDesc LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYWORD}),'%') or a.F_Price LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYWORD}),'%') )

select count(*) as count from TB_PRODUCT a where 1=1
and ( a.F_ProductName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYWORD}),'%') or a.F_ProductDesc LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYWORD}),'%') or a.F_Price LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.KEYWORD}),'%') )

select a.F_PRODUCT_ID, a.F_ProductName, a.F_ProductPic, a.F_ProductDesc, a.F_Price, a.F_ClsId, a.F_ProductTime, a.F_Status, a.F_IsSpecial, a.F_Degree, a.F_PATH1, a.F_PATH2, a.F_PATH3, a.F_PATH4, a.F_PATH5, a.F_PATH6, a.F_PATH7, a.F_PATH8 from TB_PRODUCT a

#{item}

select * from TB_PRODUCT where F_PRODUCT_ID=#{F_PRODUCT_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND F_STATUS = 1

select (select F_ClsName from tb_class tc where tc.F_ClsId = a.F_ClsId )AS F_ClsName, a.F_ClsId, a.F_ProductName, a.count from( select count(*) as count,F_ProductName,F_ClsId from tb_product where F_ProductName like CONCAT('%','${FProductName}','%' ) group by F_ClsId LIMIT 0,8)a

select F_PRODUCT_ID, F_PARENT_SKU, F_PRODUCTNAME, F_PRODUCTDESC, F_SHOW_PRICE, F_PRICE, F_REAL_PRICE, F_Number, F_Express, F_CLSID, F_ProductTime, F_Status, F_ISSPECIAL, F_Degree, F_PATH, F_PATH1, F_PATH2, F_PATH3, F_PATH4, F_PATH5, F_PATH6, F_PATH7, F_PATH8, F_BRAND, F_COLOR, F_SIZE, F_LABEL, F_SALE_NUM
from TB_PRODUCT where F_Status = 1 AND F_ClsId = #{FClsId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND F_MAIN = 1
